name: 16 Bit Gamer
description: A consistent way to get this Achievement is to die a bunch for two of the minigames, then for the third one, set Withered Sonic to 2, Withered Mario to 0, Withered Yoshi to 1, Withered Tails to 6, and Luiginette to 20, then clicking Start.
requires: |Luiginette| AND |Withered Sonic| AND |Withered Mario| AND |Withered Yoshi| AND |Withered Tails|
